name: Pizza Tower Sage Plus (Lite Version)
description:
Pizza tower Sage Plus Lite is a mod that expands on the 2019 SAGE demo of Pizza Tower that adds a ton of new animations and rooms. .The goal of Sage Plus is to experience SAGE Demo with some nice animations that spice up sage.

           We have a discord server now come and join us for daily updates :
                                                https://discord.gg/KZaxtWut8X          

        WARNING:This is the Lite version of this mod so alot of features had to be stripped to make this a public mod.If you are a patreon user then you can download Sage Plus instead which includes all the features that are promised here.Dont worry this mod will be updated along with Sage Plus so more updates to come!

(Based off of Sage Plus V5)

                                              Some features of Sage Plus Lite:   

New and Custom Snick sprites such as new HUD sprites.        

Blick is waiting to greet you with his own place!          

Press Taunt + Up to switch characters!   (Will not be accessible with the Sage Plus Lite Version)        

Levels like Sewer ,Freezer and Desert are back (Will not be accessible with Sage Plus Lite)

Hardoween Noise is playable!!

Custom Rank Screen for Snick!

And Custom rooms!

Patch notes:

Noise has some missing frames 

Snicks rank screens not done yet (only d rank is done)

Hub 2 has been reorganized

Thats it for now since this mod is meant to be a Sage Plus Patreon Free so everyone can play but sadly there isnt much going for other than some sweet custom animations for snick and noise.

There are alot more features to Sage Plus but only for patrons so be on the lookout for that if you are a patreon.Check out the Pizza Tower Modding Discord and you should see  Sage Plus under the patron mods list.The Pizza Tower Modding Discord should be in the #modding channel in Pizza Tower Discord.
